overview: Weird Scottish Comedy. Milk Paton: The Motion Picture(s) are three hilariously acidic black comedy/action stories told using an innovative mix of live action, photography and animation. Join a bottle of milk, a genius, an idiot and a guy who can turn into everyday objects as they are forced to learn the true meaning of friendship over the course of three wild adventures.
title: Milk Paton: The Motion Picture(s)
